name: v0.10.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Migrate CI to GitHub Actions  by @petergoldstein in https://github.com/waiting-for-dev/devise-jwt/pull/239
* Adds example configuration using encrypted credentials by @danielricecodes in https://github.com/waiting-for-dev/devise-jwt/pull/227
* Add Dependabot for GitHub Actions by @petergoldstein in https://github.com/waiting-for-dev/devise-jwt/pull/246
* Bump actions/checkout from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/waiting-for-dev/devise-jwt/pull/248
* [EASY PR] Update README.md for spelling and grammar clarity by @Syed-Naufal-Mahmood in https://github.com/waiting-for-dev/devise-jwt/pull/249
* Enable asymmetric algorithms by @lauramosher in https://github.com/waiting-for-dev/devise-jwt/pull/253

## New Contributors
* @petergoldstein made their first contribution in https://github.com/waiting-for-dev/devise-jwt/pull/239
* @danielricecodes made their first contribution in https://github.com/waiting-for-dev/devise-jwt/pull/227
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/waiting-for-dev/devise-jwt/pull/248
* @Syed-Naufal-Mahmood made their first contribution in https://github.com/waiting-for-dev/devise-jwt/pull/249
* @lauramosher made their first contribution in https://github.com/waiting-for-dev/devise-jwt/pull/253

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/waiting-for-dev/devise-jwt/compare/v0.9.0...v0.10.0
